choices.text:
### Human:
Put together a healthy meal plan for me for today.
### Assistant:

Here is your daily human, please follow the instructions carefully. 

1)  For breakfast this morning I recommend that you have oatmeal with fresh fruit and nuts, along with a cup of green tea or herbal tea to help start your day off right! 
2) For lunch today we can make a healthy salad using mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, avocado, and grilled chicken.  You could also add some quinoa for extra protein if you like. 

3) In the afternoon I recommend that you have an apple with almond butter as a snack to keep your energy levels up throughout the day! 
4) For dinner tonight we can make a stir fry using mixed vegetables, shrimp or chicken and brown rice.  This is a great meal because it’s both healthy and filling at the same time<|im_end|>
